data.actual_result: Discord crashes upon pressing Share button. Usually it doesn't crash instantly, first the button will simply not work, and when pressed repeatedly the crash happens
data.expected_result: Sharing debug log should work regardless of the length
data.short_description: When the debug log is very long, attempting to share it may crash Discord
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a very long debug log. For that, use the app intensively or let it open for a long time. If the scrollbar looks tiny, then you're probably good to go - Go to Debug log and tap Share button at top right. Note that sometimes you need to do it several times to reproduce it (close Share menu and tap button again)
